remarks: Swapping order of subtraction doesn't change the absolute value. Example of [Apostol] p. 363.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 29-May-2016.)
statement:
abscld.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
abssubd.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
abssubd $p |- ( ph -> ( abs ` ( A - B ) ) = ( abs ` ( B - A ) ) ) $.
